effect_entries.short_effect: Switches Tornadus, Thundurus, and Landorus between Incarnate and Therian Forme.

flavor_text_entries.text:
真実を　映しだすことで
ポケモンを　本来の　姿に
変えてしまう　不思議な　鏡。

A looking glass that reveals the truth.
It’s a mysterious glass that returns
a Pokémon to its original shape.

Specchio misterioso che, riflettendo la verità,
fa riacquistare ai Pokémon la loro forma originaria.

Una de las misteriosas Megapiedras. Permite
megaevolucionar a Gardevoir en combate.

Ein mysteriöser Spiegel, der Pokémon in
ihre eigentliche Form verwandelt, indem er
die Wahrheit widerspiegelt.

Un mystérieux miroir qui, en reflétant la vérité,
permet de redonner à un Pokémon sa forme
originelle.

진실을 비춰줌으로
포켓몬을 본래의 모습으로
바꿔버리는 이상한 거울.

しんじつを　うつしだすことで
ポケモンを　ほんらいの　すがたに
かえてしまう　ふしぎな　かがみ。

A glass that reveals the truth.
It is a mysterious glass that returns
a Pokémon back to its original shape.
